feed.title: Prowlarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.21.2.4649
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 2f67d2813a3e65cfd0966a52ac393c60735515dd Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 9a7a5fdc38c335dc009c9775d47dde09775bc70f Remove PropTypes
  • f1fdec6822f7f5d3baeddb6d8b8201eb41a4eaf9 Convert Add Indexer Modal to Typescript
  • 5464b23329700b6f697f297b924c48368d318cff Sort indexer queries stats by a sum of all 3 types
  • 4c99971882f2287353cbfbca98e695b9e405dfa4 Improve messaging on no results with applied filter
  • cc7769b601dcdd4f71cdcb10b17c568c124a64ae Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • cb2ed7daf9c64725ef7ce547cc5ce6c9c7312b9c Fixed: Improve elapsed time collecting for grabs
  • 78508094c8eb9c165085ac7612b0cc9c855d058f Bump some frontend libraries
  • b0f755a30ceade3ee74532d6b8c3a4979b631747 Fixed: (Nebulance) Searching for daily episodes using ids
  • 9d1384792aff384bfdf57d134ae1d4c4eb83af0a Bump version to 1.21.2
See More * ea17116998bf69d696977559b8da895af9e7b5c6 Fixed: (Nebulance) Avoid requests for release calls that are 2 characters or fewer * 2c23681fc511d1ac8840b2157aae54b320d4760f Automated API Docs update * 17aa2832eae143dc059b57b378f8081511d4d5db New: Split average response time statistics for queries and grabs * 5f3a329ef208f5101469d5c603ece4d915229ed0 Don't show null for non-cached indexer queries * 96f49da79e2ecde29ebccec32261446a0b709133 New: Improve history details for release grabs * c7dfde0ce99eec2280a92f88a726f3a9b7c61ecb Improve messaging for invalid request for M-Team-TP * 8cf32020f758fd6710ba9670e972a49c965ed490 New: Bump dotnet to 6.0.32 * a5ed5a0e604eefbc2ca1804adce87cf71b0e9b8e Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 3279936fc9cc5fabd8ab3bdc6d0a64bbca5d5497 New: Litestream compatibility for SQLite (#2179) * 8abccc709e0bb79943ef2b24e86f5a35c2889e86 Use natural sorting for remaining lists of items in the UI * 76f30e7682170f8ae5eec17df2f5aa53307aa4fe New: Use natural sorting for lists of items in the UI * ab289b3e420e8750af5ae55148b5fb38f9f3ea0a New: Show update settings on all platforms * ef7e04065c04a8b10c79e5f7fbb156c7bdc7c60e Fixed: (BeyondHD) Don't die on invalid TMDb ids * d1084039b3d9629cfc8a93f2470ddd950ede66e3 Bump version to 1.21.1 * 7bada440d23c309176cef29eee0ee4be0edf9090 Log invalid torrent files contents as debug [ #2169 ] * 803c4752db210999ea55f046434354164beac9ee Fixed: Sending health restored notifications with Gotify [ #2176 ] * c0777474c0d67cd764cf8456a84a6cde5eaf3d64 Bump Polly * 66dcea56041f8d64c87a9d93a8abc754927c9af6 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * a2a12d245000a0713946cec732d853dd7cdc58c2 Update SonarCloud pipeline versions (#2171) * 39593bd5a81ea5e8318210aa2a1c27c331101a4d Bump version to 1.21.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=135&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.22.0.4670
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 04b513ad14206c0c7b7e6a8bcbb0cc510df6e0c7 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 1ce7fda8bb0258a44eed65c3d3b248ffa43047cf Fixed: Removing invalid statuses on provider deletion
  • 6d09fad6758fb05e38279322f1341796c4b62ed1 Bump babel packages
  • ad061e7ecedbab524d1066c45172c2ef03193b1c Fix select background appearance on iOS
  • 3155343bcc50a70588209c4fe90be32a901ecd4e Fixed: (Uniotaku) Updated categories
  • f5e91f7bfd8d8f3de011355c965f123f1ef8580b Fixed: (RuTracker) Updated categories
  • 1d69f2ed3f3eb908c22d733999f86eab07b85a4f Fixed: (GazelleGames) Fixed release titles
  • 1d233dbcabb2a1b9b753645e147676f75a545ab8 New: Configurable log file size limit
  • 1aafb0b20155a9105505452cd15ddcde44ce2fde New: Add Compact Log Event Format option for console logging
  • d7d5a2dd428dfcd8ed0625414f909e8e3c43b33a Upgrade nlog to 5.3.3
  • 8060a65ef6f560dc60014c87c147bbf57785be8a Fixed: Duplicated changelog lines
  • 379071f838ec589ac3c660e29b801311e837d827 Convert formatBytes to TypeScript
  • 5cbbd060a43be1dac97e5c1b4695f504cf3f3d10 Update React Lint rules for TSX
  • ef19673a76ba84935628f72c45feb41e38cdf7e3 Convert System to TypeScript
  • c3cf8a6ebb6baee55d2d57f12efd1c8336153586 Convert App to TypeScript
  • c22b27525ad6ce47821dc26261e77cf332b34de5 Include available version in update health check
  • eec3b01f5b416d3ce15309a332de2bab3133c776 Don't hash files in development builds
  • e67a127a02fb1020f137dbeb9a206eb75da59aab Fixed: Allow leading/trailing spaces on non-Windows
  • a074ebc951ce73618fb69eb939f0594fecae2fcf New: Default file log level changed to debug
  • d1cd8146632a0c92041eaa60d06392ecb7b74e94 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • ac76646a20f566612aae46962f0450b4f12a8da6 Fixed: Fallback to saved capabilities when syncing failed indexers
  • 6549f799f648266c213a4f346139a9934b369ae1 Fix parsing imdb ids for native indexers
  • cca55fd66c177315a2c3922d30bd03b4bfbd1308 Bump version to 1.22.0

This list of changes was auto generated.

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.23.1.4708
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 32d23d6636aebc4490e36215bebf1a786abdb46f Simplify cookie clearing for MAM
  • b31b695887f3288ff4d141af60fabecf68c6e555 Fixed: Mapping of Cardigann indexers on bulk edit
  • 33de32b1383d209f6a22c451d5171c5920245c95 Simplify app profile validation on indexers
  • 753b53a5293ed8b0dafa612d4e76a7d01f327cf7 Use UTC for filtering out AB releases
  • 123535b9a5b2046b065fc39b9f2292370f530f84 Fixed: Use renewed mam_id from response to avoid invalid credentials after original one expires
  • 7a5fa452f0bcdc8647ffba4b368845031e65e2a5 Don't persist value for SslCertHash when checking for existence
  • 281e7125423fde983d4b4121de55c4b0adad4494 Fixed: Hide reboot and shutdown UI buttons on docker
  • c2c34ecf53e353dd219c91dedc1eda5f8c24bbc4 New: Bypass IP addresses ranges in proxies [ #2203 ]
  • 615193617c0862a697db40e44635506693a7e976 Fixed: Trim spaces and empty values in Proxy Bypass List
  • 1b58d50b6d8e288652125bfa1cf5e44f2eaf7df7 Bump version to 1.23.1
See More * 99f9a0b4e6f354d2406a95605b113a7d3912c5ba Improve sorting indexer by status * 696001a8bb65921df66031eaeac4d37f0e07c3ac Remove AroLol * 31f057c0970ff8301363d2c7c04c5dc577eb1453 Hiding "enable" property in API docs for applications * 0391537a6093ae633f77d9e4f9190a026bc83839 Don't display validation errors as HTML * 521c1f760cf17fd69e79baaca974e2cc8ac97e00 Automated API Docs update * 3bf9b4f90fd1a0aea276b8858108f6c04b5ad03c Dedupe titles to avoid similar release names for AB * af86a6d34e25044f0e4223dd77a024eda1ffc4b9 New: Configure log file size limit in UI * 3ecf5c616684c9376dea651a3af9bfa1ad81792e Fixed: (AnimeBytes) Improve filtering of old releases * 4da3e7b2b3165ad53e23df96ae91457b83f8b675 Fixed: (MyAnonamouse) Sanitise search query and stop search if term is empty * 66f38f15663948b3664217738c7910c9fc7e0b6a Bump version to 1.23.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=140&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.24.3.4754
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 17e1a72baf2b547e5944e04434af1c1895391f4f Bump webpack to 5.94.0 and regenerate yarn.lock

  • 97d1384726a2c114fc2f5e688a222604f1caa245 Guard against using invalid sort keys
  • ba002a7a4af8ae8bd2413f0aa3d2e4ddb1c3f358 Add packages needed for RemoveDiacritics

See More * 710ab7ae090b2bb0a86dde08aa830595b2ea8bcc New: (Gazelle/OPS/RED) Prevent downloads without FL tokens * 434b07ae648d04088ada30c6853680831e3cc04b New: Sync seeding limits for LazyLibrarian (#2215) * eee8c95ca66f84f3cd2cc5c0f28654a7f1395e14 Fix weblate widget * 1f5c5140118d94eaf2d7a0b1c7ce0e2edd953a6f Bump version to 1.24.1 * 66d722e0970754c64418735c498c5f968d657073 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 39befe5aa4f409cbc4d237bd7a657aaa21fc1af7 Use error message from Nebulance response [ #2212 ] * ab043e87dc13e693cecbe4a02c82e825cf85a9a1 Display grabs, failures and queries stats with values * 58ae9c0a13daa5c72cd46e7257e801c68481f590 Fixed: (MyAnonamouse) Avoid using FL wedges for freeleech torrents * 44c446943c4f4c75a3dac65d05be515d5cdc2395 Fixed: (Gazelle) Allow freeleech torrents with Use Freeleech Tokens * 8301b669fe3ce43a5930476422535e3f98f27f59 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 6fa0b79c673c15d23afff1c8003c438c54582752 Bump version to 1.24.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=145&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.25.4.4818
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 3f547f08567d07b29939e56ff231ed2d3d715348 Cleanse exceptions in event logs
